      • deviceChanged

        public void deviceChanged(AylaDevice device,
                          Change change)
        从接口复制的说明: AylaDevice.DeviceChangeListener
        Called when the status of a device changes. This includes property changes, online status changes, etc.
        指定者:
        deviceChanged 在接口中 AylaDevice.DeviceChangeListener
        参数:
        device - The device that changed
        change - Change object describing the devices that changed. This is usually a FieldChange or PropertyChange object.

      • deviceError

        public void deviceError(AylaDevice device,
                        AylaError error)
        从接口复制的说明: AylaDevice.DeviceChangeListener
        Called whenever an error occurs for this device.
        指定者:
        deviceError 在接口中 AylaDevice.DeviceChangeListener
        参数:
        device - Device that encountered the error
        error - Error encountered on this device.

      • deviceLanStateChanged

        public void deviceLanStateChanged(AylaDevice device,
                                  boolean lanModeEnabled)
        从接口复制的说明: AylaDevice.DeviceChangeListener
        Called whenever the device enters or leaves LAN mode
        指定者:
        deviceLanStateChanged 在接口中 AylaDevice.DeviceChangeListener
        参数:
        device - the device that changed
        lanModeEnabled - true if the device has entered LAN mode, false if it left LAN mode

      • onPrepareOptionsMenu

        public void onPrepareOptionsMenu(android.view.Menu menu)
        覆盖:

      • shareDevices

        public void shareDevices(java.lang.String email,
                         java.lang.String role,
                         java.util.Calendar startDate,
                         java.util.Calendar endDate,
                         boolean readOnly,
                         java.util.List<AylaDevice> devicesToShare)
        从接口复制的说明: ShareDevicesFragment.ShareDevicesListener
        When the user taps the "Share" button, this listener method will be called with information about the shares. This method will also be called if the user does not have any devices that can be shared. All fields will be null / false in that case.
        指定者:
        shareDevices 在接口中 ShareDevicesFragment.ShareDevicesListener
        参数:
        email - Email address of the user to share devices with, or null if canceled
        role - Enable the role based sharing feature, or null for regular sharing
        startDate - Date the sharing begins, or null if none selected
        endDate - Date the sharing ends, or null if none selected
        readOnly - Set to true if the share can not be controlled by the recipient
        devicesToShare - A list of devices to be shared, or null if the user canceled
